hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #a Magic Meter# can be found in #the Graveyard#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #3# major items.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# hoards #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

GC (Maze).text: Have you embraced the power of the Deku Nut yet?

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #Dodongo's Cavern# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)# and #a Piece of Heart#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Blue Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Shadow Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found at #Zora's River#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that a #heavy pillar# outside the castle obstructs the #Treasure Box Shop#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #the Iron Boots# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasures of Ice Cavern# are...^ #a Hookshot# and #the Requiem of Spirit#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #Lon Lon Ranch# is on the path of time.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that #the Market# is on the way of the hero.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Graveyard# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Bomb Bag#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the path of time.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that the #Gerudo Horseback Archery# rewards...^ #Bombs (5 pieces)# and #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that plundering #the Death Mountain Crater# is a foolish choice.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Why are the floating skulls called "Bubbles" and the floating bubbles "Shaboms"?

SFM (Saria).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #Epona's Song#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that #deep in the wasteland# is #Bombchus (10 pieces)#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Arrows (5 pieces)#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #a Red Rupee#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Fishing Pond#.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Serenade of Water#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Seeds (30 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Wallet# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that ##Gerudo Valley## has #2# major items.
